communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Hint at patterns; drop breadcrumbs; avoid full explanations to keep intrigue.

narratives.c_essay: The truth is hidden in plain sight, but only a select few can see it. The rest are blind to the reality of our world, controlled by shadowy forces that manipulate the narrative to suit their agenda.
narratives.p_intro: Welcome to my channel, where we dive into the rabbit hole and uncover the secrets they don't want you to know.
